snippet: It would be a show of strength for the socialist stalwart, who has been weakened by cancer and is struggling to convince Venezuelans that he has beaten the disease.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez will attend the Summit of the Americas in Cartegena, Colombia, as he struggles to convince his constituents that he has successfully overcome his bout with cancer.
lead_paragraph: It would be a show of strength for the socialist stalwart, who has been weakened by cancer and is struggling to convince Venezuelans that he has beaten the disease.

headline.main: Chávez Will Join Foreign Leaders at Meeting in Colombia, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Chávez Will Join Foreign Leaders At Meeting in Colombia, Official Says
